mapper.update: update local_delay_message set status = 1 where id = #{id} and status = 0
mapper.select: select min(time) as checkPoint from (select min(time) as time from local_delay_message where status = 0 union all select max(time) as time from local_delay_message where status != 0) as tmp

select min(time) as nextCheckPoint from (select min(time) as time from local_delay_message where status = 0 and time >= #{oldCheckPoint} union all select max(time) as time from local_delay_message where status != 0 and time >= #{oldCheckPoint}) as tmp
mapper.insert: insert into local_delay_message(id, topic, tag, is_tx, platform, platform_msg_id, trace_id, trace_version, business_id, payload, time, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id}, #{topic}, #{tag}, #{isTx}, #{platform}, #{platformMsgId}, #{traceId}, #{traceVersion}, #{businessId}, #{payload}, #{time}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
